Sentencas: Samples of general formula Ba(0.9)Ln(0.1)Fe(1 - y)Co(y)O(3 - delta) (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu; y = 0.1-0.9) were studied at 1100 degrees C under air.
Titulo: Crystal Structure and Oxygen Nonstoichiometry of Ba0.9Ln0.1Fe1-yCoyO3-δ (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu) Solid Solutions

Sentencas: X-ray powder diffraction data for samples prepared by glycerol-nitrate technology were used to determine the homogeneity range of Ba(0.9)Ln(0.1)Fe(1 - y)Co(y)O(3 - delta) solid solutions (ss): 0.1 <= y <= 0.7 for Ln = Nd, 0.1 <= y <= 0.5 for Ln = Sm, and 0.1 <= y <= 0.4 for Ln = Eu.
Titulo: Crystal Structure and Oxygen Nonstoichiometry of Ba0.9Ln0.1Fe1-yCoyO3-δ (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu) Solid Solutions

Sentencas: The crystal structure of single-phase oxides was described in terms of a cubic unit cell (space group Pm (3) over barm).
Titulo: Crystal Structure and Oxygen Nonstoichiometry of Ba0.9Ln0.1Fe1-yCoyO3-δ (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu) Solid Solutions

Sentencas: The increasing cobalt content or rare-earth atomic radius brings about an increase in Ba(0.9)Ln(0.1)Fe(1 - y)Co(y)O(3 - delta) unit cell parameter.
Titulo: Crystal Structure and Oxygen Nonstoichiometry of Ba0.9Ln0.1Fe1-yCoyO3-δ (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu) Solid Solutions

Sentencas: The oxygen content (3 - delta) in the temperature range 25-1100 degrees C under air was determined by thermogravimetry and iodometric titration.
Titulo: Crystal Structure and Oxygen Nonstoichiometry of Ba0.9Ln0.1Fe1-yCoyO3-δ (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu) Solid Solutions

Sentencas: Oxygen exchange between the solid oxide and gas phase starts at similar to 350 degrees C.
Titulo: Crystal Structure and Oxygen Nonstoichiometry of Ba0.9Ln0.1Fe1-yCoyO3-δ (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu) Solid Solutions

Sentencas: The oxygen content and mean oxidation state of the 3d metal in Ba(0.9)Ln(0.1)Fe(1 - y)Co(y)O(3 - delta) both decrease as the cobalt concentration increases or the lanthanide atomic number increases.
Titulo: Crystal Structure and Oxygen Nonstoichiometry of Ba0.9Ln0.1Fe1-yCoyO3-δ (Ln = Nd, Sm, Eu) Solid Solutions
